devdoc.details: Responsible for enacting decisions related to ARCH token supply Decisions are made via a timelocked propose/accept scheme Initial proposal length (timelock) is 30 days

params._admin: The admin account for this contract

params.newAdmin: The address of the new admin

params.amount: The number of tokens to be burned
params.src: The address of the account that will burn tokens

params.amount: The number of tokens to be minted
params.dst: The address of the destination account

params.newCap: The new mint cap in bips (10,000 bips = 1% of totalSupply)

devdoc.title: SupplyManager

AdminAccepted(address,address).notice: An event that's emitted when a new admin is accepted

AdminCanceled(address).notice: An event that's emitted when an admin proposal is canceled

AdminProposed(address,address,uint256).notice: An event that's emitted when a new admin is proposed

BurnAccepted(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: An event that's emitted when a new burn is accepted

BurnCanceled(uint256,address).notice: An event that's emitted when a burn proposal is canceled

BurnProposed(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: An event that's emitted when a new burn is proposed

MintAccepted(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: An event that's emitted when a new mint is accepted

MintCanceled(uint256,address).notice: An event that's emitted when a mint proposal is canceled

MintCapAccepted(uint16,uint16).notice: An event that's emitted when a new mint cap is accepted

MintCapCanceled(uint16).notice: An event that's emitted when a mint cap proposal is canceled

MintCapProposed(uint16,uint16,uint256).notice: An event that's emitted when a new mint cap is proposed

MintProposed(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: An event that's emitted when a new mint is proposed

ProposalLengthAccepted(uint32,uint32).notice: An event that's emitted when a new proposal length is accepted

ProposalLengthCanceled(uint32).notice: An event that's emitted when a proposal length proposal is canceled

ProposalLengthProposed(uint32,uint32,uin.notice: An event that's emitted when a new proposal length is proposed

SupplyManagerAccepted(address,address).notice: An event that's emitted when a new supply manager is accepted

SupplyManagerCanceled(address).notice: An event that's emitted when a supply manager proposal is canceled

SupplyManagerProposed(address,address,ui.notice: An event that's emitted when a new supply manager is proposed

WaitingPeriodAccepted(uint32,uint32).notice: An event that's emitted when a new waiting period is accepted

WaitingPeriodCanceled(uint32).notice: An event that's emitted when a waiting period proposal is canceled

WaitingPeriodProposed(uint32,uint32,uint.notice: An event that's emitted when a new waiting period is proposed

acceptMintCap().notice: Accept change to the maximum amount of tokens that can be minted at once

acceptProposalLength().notice: Accept change to the proposal length

acceptSupplyChangeWaitingPeriod().notice: Accept change to the supply change waiting period

acceptSupplyManager().notice: Accept change to the supplyManager address

admin().notice: Address which may make changes to token supply by calling provided functions

cancelProposalLength().notice: Cancel proposed update to proposal length

changeAllowedAfter().notice: The timestamp after which a change may occur

proposalLength().notice: The current time between proposal and acceptance

proposalLengthMinimum().notice: The minimum time between proposal and acceptance

proposeMintCap(uint16).notice: Propose change to the maximum amount of tokens that can be minted at once

proposeNewProposalLength(uint32).notice: Propose change to the proposal length

proposeSupplyChangeWaitingPeriod(uint32).notice: Propose change to the supply change waiting period

proposeSupplyManager(address).notice: Propose change to the supplyManager address
